Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RF_BatteryMonStatus_t

Battery monitor status type.

Enumerator:
RF_SUCCESS_BAT_MON_STATUS 

Voltage threshold has been successfuly set

RF_FAIL_BAT_MON_STATUS 

Voltage threshold cannot be set, because supply voltage is already below the provided voltage threshold value

Definition at line 74 of file rfBattery.h.

Function Documentation

void RF_BatteryMonReq ( RF_BatteryMonReq_t *  reqParams)

Sets battery monitor voltage threshold.

If the supply voltage on one of the radio chip pins falls below the provided voltage threshold value, the indication callback set in the RF_BatteryMonReq_t::RF_BatteryMonInd field is called. The other callback function, set in the RF_BatteryMonReq_t::RF_BatteryMonConf field is called on completion of the request to indicate that the request's executed successfully and the threshold has been set or that the threshold has not been set (a possible reason is that the supply voltage is already below the provided threshold value).

Parameters:
[in]reqParams- request parameters structure pointer
Returns:
none
